law.text: As used in KRS 160.460 to 160.597, unless the context requires otherwise: "Tax-levying authority" shall mean boards of education of county school districts and independent school districts.
law.history: Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 476, Pt. V, sec. 232, effective July 13, 1990. -- Created 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 127, sec. 1.
